ygData.subject: Re: Bone Chips...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, unlike UO which got skills cap, EQ allows u to max out all ya char skills, provided he can learn the skills for his race and class.  Some pple, like our
ygData.messageBody:
Well, unlike UO which got skills cap, EQ allows u to max out all ya char
skills, provided he can learn the skills for his race and class. Some
pple, like our parang master, create an enchanter (vital stats is CHA) to
buy/sell stuffs. For me I dun bother too much, since Ziltus is quite
handsome, ahem, hehe. Comparing with my gnome wiz in Prexus server, my
high-elf wiz buy those 5-6gp scrolls cheaper by 1gp.

I dun think I have time to train so many chars. I will focus all my time
on Ziltus now.

Talk abt loan shark, we dn have any in the local community. But we got a
gangster player who carry parang ard. U dun borrow money also can kena
chopped sometime, be careful...shhhh.h......;)

Ziltus

On Tuesday, 06 July, 1999 2:06 PM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
[SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> i have heard that gnome necros killing any gnome skeles will have to
suffer
> factions hits... n DE necros will have to suffer hit when they kill too
> many... so i tend to avoid em at time... unless im in need of em.... if u
> guys got any to spare... pls keep em in ya bank fer me... n i will
certainly
> pay fer em... the most borrow from Loan Shark n buy from u lor...
kekekek...
>
> from what i know... neriak got all the stuff to start up brewing... so i
> should be doing that this weekendz... n also... i heard pottery could be
> another good skill fer newbies... but if u have brewing... i dont think
> pottery is of any help... perhaps when i got more time n money... might
take
> up tailorng or something... most likely will try to have diff char with
diff
> trade skills... instead of all in one...
>
> Nicademous
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 2:58 PM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Bone Chips...
>
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > I will try to save all bone chip for u. Btw I heard necro cant hunt
> > decaying skeleton coz this will make ya guildmaster refuse to teach u
> > skills, true or not? How abt other undeads like skeleton
> king/queen/bishop
> > at BB chest board? Maybe u shld join Zanderion, while he is still at
> > Farydark, to hunt there. I used to loot war-chip (or bone?) there, not
> > sure if this help in ya summoning. The last time I heard pple offering
> 3pp
> > for 100 bone chips, which is reasonable since u can sell it to npc for
2sp
> > plus each. Anything above 3pp is kinda expensive, but when u lvl up,
> > what's is 3pp man? Hehe. Dun worry, I gave u mine for free ;)
> >
> > Ziltus
> >
> > On Tuesday, 06 July, 1999 12:52 PM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy

> > >
> > > hi guys,
> > > just to let u guys know that if u have any bone chips... im willing
to
> > buy
> > > them... pls save em fer me in ya bank... n will buy from u guys when
u
> > all
> > > got lotsa bone chips n when i got da cash....
> > >
> > > not sure how much u guys sell those bone chips fer... but usually one
> > would
> > > pay like 2-5pp fer 100 bone chips... u think that a reasonable price?
> > >
> > > Nicademous
> > > p/s: how do u write ya profile fer ya char ah?
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: Synzzz <hannibal@...>
> > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 1:36 PM
> > > Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Money money money, hehe
> > >
> > >
> > > > From: "Synzzz" <hannibal@...>
> > > >
> > > > Hey Ziltus,
> > > >
> > > > Wah lau, don't make it sound like we're begging for money leh.
> > > > I know I complained i'm broke but i didn't say I wanted you guys
> > > > to give me any :P Donations are always accepted lah of course
> > > > but the key thing, i believe, is that I don't go around hoping for
> them
> > > > or asking you guys for any.
> > > >
> > > > It's just that i spent 3 whole nights making 40+ pp from hunting?
And
> i
> > > > spent
> > > > them all on my lvl8 spells which cost 3pp 9gp 8scp per spell.
> > > > I'm almost lvl 11 and i'm just thinking at this rate...when i hit
lvl
> > 12
> > > and
> > > > buy those new spells at 5-6pp each...i need at least another
60pp??
> > Wah..
> > > > siong man
> > > >
> > > > I did hear of the brewing thing...just that when first heard of
> > it...was
> > > not
> > > > very
> > > > sure of the details...but i guess now i probably would try.
> > > >
> > > > One more thing is that in my area where i've been hunting of
> late...you
> > > get
> > > > better exp
> > > > but only shitty bones for loot. (Mummies, skeletons,chessboard Skel
> > Pawns,
> > > > etc...)
> > > > So i had to choose between levelling and making money. I chose
> > levelling
> > > cos
> > > > i want to hit lvl 12 faster...the bind affinity spell i thought can
> use
> > to
> > > > make some money!
> > > > Alot of ppl are willing to pay 1pp at least for a bind somewhere.
Best
> > > > man...if got 20 ppl
> > > > in one night...20pp liaoz...LOL Don't think so easy lah hehe
Besides
> > I'll
> > > > only do that when
> > > > i'm short on cash (which is most of the time). I prefer to do for
free
> > > > actually. Nice guy here :)
> > > >
> > > > Ok that's it for me...off to work (late again hiaks)
> > > >
> > > > Zanderion [lvl 10 magi] Innoruuk
> > > >
> > > > p.s Thanks for the advice Ziltus!
> > > >
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

> > > > >
> > > > > Jus a thought.
> > > > >
> > > > > Everyone start off been very poor, and even at lvl 18, I'm still
> very
> > > > poor,
> > > > > unlike our rich man Garren, hehe.
> > > > >
> > > > > We guys gotta learn to stand on our feet sometime. I think
brewing
> > is a
> > > > > very useful trade skill which can easily fulfill ya financial
needs,
> > > just
> > > > > that it's kinda boring and take times. Nevertheless comparing
with
> > > > > hunting, brewing still give me better and faster return than
hunting
> > so
> > > > > far. If we can spend 1-3 hrs a day brewing, I dun see why the
new
> > chaps
> > > > > cant do the same ;) No doubt we try to help by sponsoring abit,
but
> > u
> > > > guys
> > > > > have to help us to help yaself sometimes ;)
> > > > >
> > > > > One thing for sure, we the local kakis always keep items which we
> > think
> > > > > other kakis can used (eg I keep cutt ring for newbies, ring mails
> for
> > > > > tanks, garren keep thu robe for me, les keep woven for me etc).
We
> > will
> > > > > try to help as and when we can, but one must understand the fact
tat
> > > > > utimately u r the one playing the game and handling ya own char,
> > hehe.
> > > > >
> > > > > IMHO, brewing can make some quick buck. At lvl 10 u shld be able
to
> > > save
> > > > > up to 10pp. Of coz I know pple will use them to buy stuffs like
> > > > > weap/armor/scrolls. But just ponder - if u spend it on brewing,
u
> > can
> > > > earn
> > > > > even more to buys stuffs, at the same time maxing ya skill.
> > > > >
> > > > > At lvl 18 now, I'm still picking up bone chips, rusty weaps,
animal
> > > skins,
> > > > > beetle eyes and even rat tooth (7cp) to sell. FYI I'm a wiz with
> the
> > > > > weakest STR amg all races and I keep SIX bags on me to carry
loot.
> > Many
> > > > > times u see me walking between EC and WC while I'm actually
running
> > with
> > > > > 200% overload on me, haha. If I can try so hard to save up
money,
> > I
> > > dun
> > > > > see why others cant do it. ;P
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > Ziltus.
> > > > >
> > > > > p/s: Just FYI, the npc at tunnel buy at a lower price than FP
npc,
> > so I
> > > > > die die gotta 'walk' back to FP sell. Now u see I earn all my
money
> > > using
> > > > > all my blood, sweat and tears, hehe ;)
